creator: chedong@yeah.net
text:
I think many articles on apache install included these options:
http://www.google.com/search?q=shared+module+max+enable+most+apache

but I found in apache1.3.26 the --shared-module=max not supported any more:

./configure --prefix=/home/apache --shared-module=max --enable-module=most
Configuring for Apache, Version 1.3.26
 + using installation path layout: Apache (config.layout)
configure:Error: invalid option '--shared-module=max'

and I hope "--shared-module=max" option can be added to Apache2.x too.

Thank you
creator: chedong@yeah.net

text:
sorry
It's my fault:
 --enable-shared=max 
not --shared-module=max

please close this bug reporting
creator: chedong@yeah.net
